Cases.title: CFI Solutions
Cases.subtitle: Consulting and integrations for 3DEXPERIENCE & DELMIA Apriso.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: Empowering companies through strategic consulting and technical support for faster 3DEXPERIENCE and DELMIA Apriso adoption.

Implementations.title: Implementations
Implementations.desc: End-to-end design and implementation of 3DEXPERIENCE and DELMIA Apriso with a focus on time-to-value.

Integrations.title: Integrations
Integrations.desc: Integrations with PLM/ERP/MES systems, shop-floor connectivity, and full traceability.

Technical Support.title: Technical Support
Technical Support.desc: Corrective and adaptive support, performance monitoring, and operational optimization.

Industries.title: Industries & Partners
Industries.subtitle: We collaborate with global leaders across industries to implement cutting-edge digital manufacturing solutions.

Integrations.title: Integrations connecting design, operations and analytics
Integrations.subtitle: We connect your PLM/MES stack with ERP and Analytics for seamless end-to-end traceability.

3DEXPERIENCE.blurb: Central PLM platform for governance, collaboration, and end-to-end traceability.

DELMIA Apriso.blurb: Manufacturing execution, genealogy, and real-time quality control.

CATIA.blurb: 3D design and advanced surfacing integrated across the PLM lifecycle.

ENOVIA.blurb: Product collaboration, BOM, change management and compliance in 3DEXPERIENCE.

Jira.blurb: Agile work management and full traceability from requirement to deployment.

SAP.blurb: ERP integration for orders, master data and finance connected to the shop floor.

About.title: About CFI Solutions
About.paragraph: CFI Solutions is a consulting firm specialized in Digital Manufacturing and MES/MOM systems. We optimize operations through DELMIA Apriso and 3DEXPERIENCE, blending technical depth with strategic consulting.

Contact.title: Let’s build your digital manufacturing roadmap
Contact.subtitle: Tell us about your 3DEXPERIENCE, DELMIA Apriso, CATIA or integration needs. We will respond within 1 business day.
